body:
Hello WhatsApp Support Team,

I am submitting a manual appeal for my WhatsApp account {no}, which appears to have been permanently blocked.

Please assist in reviewing and restoring my account.

Thank you.

Dear Support,

My WhatsApp number {no} has been permanently restricted. I kindly request a thorough review of my account.

Thank you for your assistance.

Hello WhatsApp Team,

I would like to appeal the permanent ban applied to my WhatsApp account {no}. I believe this is a mistake and would appreciate your review.

Sincerely.
